articles.description: Filmfare Awards 2024 Nominations: Notable contenders in the Best Film category include Vidhu Vinod Chopra's 12th Fail, Sandeep Reddy Vanga's Animal, Atlee Kumar's Jawan and Karan's Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani.
articles.content: Ahead of the 69th edition of the Filmfare Awards, the organisers unveiled the list of nominations. Host Karan Johar and actors Varun Dhawan and Janhvi Kapoor were present during the press conference … [+7175 chars]

articles.title: Salaar’s OTT Release Date Is Here? - M9
articles.description: Post theatrical OTT rights of Salaar are with Netflix and the film willavailable for streaming on the platform from the 16th of February.
articles.content:
Prabhas and Prashanth Neels Salaar had a seven run at the box office. The stage is now set for the OTT release of the actioner and here is an intersting report that is going viral on social media.

articles.title: Munawar Faruqui Confirms Sending Rishtas to Anjali Arora, Ayesha Khan On Bigg Boss 17 - Times Now
articles.description: Bigg Boss 17's last night's episode (January 14) saw Karan Johar slamming Isha Malviya over her statement towards Munawar Faruqui. Later, Abhishek Kumar was seen talking about Ayesha Khan's claims about Munawar Faruqui sending rishtas to five girls. The stand…
